CameraModel.h

00001 #if !defined( CAMERAMODEL_H )
00002 #define CAMERAMODEL_H
00003 #pragma once
00004 #include "cv.h" 
00005 #include "highgui.h" 
00006 #include "Model.h"
00007 #include "Line.h"
00008 
00009 enum CameraModelType {PROJECTION=0, SPHERICAL=1};
00010 // PROJECTION - perspective projection model
00011 // SPHERICAL - unprojected map (or equirectangular projection) model
00012 
00013 class CameraModel : public Model
00014 {
00015     DECLARE_SERIAL(CameraModel)
00016     // all camera model parameters are in normalized X'Y' coordinates for numerical stability
00017     // X' = (X-w/2)/((w+h)/4)     Y' = (Y-h/2)/((w+h)/4)
00018     // where w and h are width and height of the image
00019 public:
00020     CvMat *VX, *VY, *VZ, *P; // vanishing points and projection matrix
00021     CvMat *hImage, *hReal, *pReal;  // image/world homogeneous and real coordinates
00022     CvMat *A2x2, *B2x1, *X2x1, *A3x3, *B3x1, *X3x1; // mascellaneous matrices
00023     double scale;
00024     // projection matrix P = K [R T]
00025     // K - intrinsic camera parameters
00026     // R - camera rotation
00027     // T - camera translation
00028     int w, h;
00029     CArray<CLine> x, y, z, r;
00030     CArray<int> num;
00031     double m_elevation; // camera elevation 
00032     double m_minBodyDistance, m_maxBodyDistance; // minimum and maximum body distance for this camera model
00033     int m_cameraType; // {PROJECTION=0, SPHERICAL=1}
00034 
00035     CameraModel(void);
00036     virtual ~CameraModel(void);
00037     virtual void Serialize(CArchive& ar);
00038     CvPoint2D32f coordsHomo2Image(CvMat* v);    
00039     void coordsImage2Homo(CvPoint2D32f p, CvMat* v);
00040     CvPoint2D32f coordsImage2Spheric(CvPoint2D32f p);
00041     CvPoint2D32f coordsSpheric2Image(CvPoint2D32f s);
00042 
00043     CvPoint2D32f coordsReal2Image(CvPoint3D32f p);  
00044     CvPoint3D32f coordsImage2Real(CvPoint2D32f p, double z=0);  
00045     CvPoint3D32f coordsImage2Real(CvPoint2D32f p, CvPoint3D32f ref1, CvPoint3D32f ref2);    
00046 
00047     double computeScanlineWeight(int y);
00048     double computeHeight(CvPoint2D32f top, CvPoint2D32f bottom);
00049     double computeX(CvPoint2D32f pIm, CvPoint3D32f pReal);
00050     double computeY(CvPoint2D32f pIm, CvPoint3D32f pReal);
00051     double computeZ(CvPoint2D32f pIm, CvPoint3D32f pReal);
00052     double coordsImage2RealSameXY_Feet2Floor(CvPoint2D32f top, CvPoint2D32f bot, CvPoint3D32f* head = NULL, CvPoint3D32f* foot=NULL);
00053     double coordsDistanceFromCamera(CvPoint3D32f p);
00054 
00055     void Draw(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color);
00056     void DrawDistanceMap(IplImage* frame);
00057     void DrawVerticalSpheroid(IplImage* frame, CvPoint3D32f center, CvSize2D32f axes, CvScalar color, bool fill = false);
00058 };
